scripts.prepare: npm run clean && cd ../src && npm run setup && cd ../publish && npm run copy && npm run pack
scripts.copy: mkdir src &&  cpy '../src/**/*' 'src' --parents && npm run copy-docs
scripts.prepack: cd src && rimraf hooks typings references.d.ts .DS_Store **/.DS_Store
scripts.pack: mkdir package && cd package && npm pack ../src
